chap07

Class RationalNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • chap07.RationalNumber

  • public class RationalNumber
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one rational number with a numerator and denominator. Does not handle divide by zero errors (no exception handling)
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Lewis, Loftus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RationalNumber(int numer, int denom)
      Constructor: Sets up the rational number by ensuring a nonzero denominator and making only the numerator signed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RationalNumber add(RationalNumber op2)
      Adds this rational number to the one passed as a parameter.
      RationalNumber divide(RationalNumber op2)
      Divides this rational number by the one passed as a parameter by multiplying by the reciprocal of the second rational.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object op2)
      Determines if this rational number is equal to the one passed as a parameter.
      int getDenominator()
      Returns the denominator of this rational number.
      int getNumerator()
      Returns the numerator of this rational number.
      int hashCode()
      Satisfies requirement that for all RationalNumber r1, r2: if r1.equals(r2) then r1.hashCode() == r2.hashCode().
      RationalNumber multiply(RationalNumber op2)
      Multiplies this rational number by the one passed as a parameter.
      RationalNumber reciprocal()
      Returns the reciprocal of this rational number.
      RationalNumber subtract(RationalNumber op2)
      Subtracts the rational number passed as a parameter from this rational number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns this rational number as a string.

      • add

        public RationalNumber add(RationalNumber op2)
        Adds this rational number to the one passed as a parameter. A common denominator is found by multiplying the individual denominators.
        Parameters:
        op2 - The value to add to this
        Returns:
        The sum of this + op2

      • subtract

        public RationalNumber subtract(RationalNumber op2)
        Subtracts the rational number passed as a parameter from this rational number.
        Parameters:
        op2 - The value to subtract from this
        Returns:
        The difference of this - op2

      • multiply

        public RationalNumber multiply(RationalNumber op2)
        Multiplies this rational number by the one passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        op2 - The value to multiply to this
        Returns:
        The product of this * op2

      • divide

        public RationalNumber divide(RationalNumber op2)
        Divides this rational number by the one passed as a parameter by multiplying by the reciprocal of the second rational.
        Parameters:
        op2 - The value to divide into this
        Returns:
        The quotient of this / op2

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object op2)
        Determines if this rational number is equal to the one passed as a parameter. Assumes they are both reduced.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        op2 - The value to compare to this
        Returns:
        true if this is equal to op2 numerically

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Satisfies requirement that for all RationalNumber r1, r2: if r1.equals(r2) then r1.hashCode() == r2.hashCode(). if !r1.equals(r2) then r1.hashCode() != r2.hashCode() if possible.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        hash code for this
